verses.verse: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu, that came to Jeremiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei concerning הַבַּצָּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H1226><s%> hab-batz-tza-Rot. the dearth

אָבְלָ֣ה <S%H56><s%> 'a-ve-Lah mourneth יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, Judah וּשְׁעָרֶ֥יהָ <S%H8179><s%> u-she-'a-Rei-ha and the gates אֻמְלְל֖וּ <S%H535><s%> 'um-le-Lu thereof languish קָדְר֣וּ <S%H6937><s%> ka-de-Ru they are black לָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz; unto the ground וְצִוְחַ֥ת <S%H6682><s%> ve-tziv-Chat and the cry יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem עָלָֽתָה׃ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-La-tah. is gone up

וְאַדִּ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H117><s%> ve-'ad-Di-rei-Hem, And their nobles שָׁלְח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> sha-le-Chu have sent; צְעֹורֵיהֶם tze-'o-rei-hem כצְעִירֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6810><s%> tze-'i-rei-Hem least קלַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> lam-Ma-yim; to the waters בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u they came עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto גֵּבִ֞ים <S%H1356><s%> ge-Vim the cisterns לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no מָ֣צְאוּ <S%H4672><s%> Ma-tze-'u [and] found מַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, no water שָׁ֤בוּ <S%H7725><s%> Sha-vu they returned כְלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H3627><s%> che-lei-Hem with their vessels רֵיקָ֔ם <S%H7387><s%> rei-Kam, empty בֹּ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Bo-shu they were ashamed וְהָכְלְמ֖וּ <S%H3637><s%> ve-ha-che-le-Mu and confounded וְחָפ֥וּ <S%H2645><s%> ve-cha-Fu and covered רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sham. their heads

בַּעֲב֤וּר <S%H5668><s%> ba-'a-Vur Because הָאֲדָמָה֙ <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah Because the ground חַ֔תָּה <S%H2865><s%> Chat-tah, is chapt כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah has been גֶ֖שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> Ge-shem for there was no rain בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz; in the earth בֹּ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Bo-shu were ashamed אִכָּרִ֖ים <S%H406><s%> 'ik-ka-Rim the plowmen חָפ֥וּ <S%H2645><s%> cha-Fu they covered רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sham. their heads

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- even אַיֶּ֙לֶת֙ <S%H365><s%> 'ai-Ye-let Yea the hind בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh, in the field יָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah also calved וְעָז֑וֹב <S%H5800><s%> ve-'a-Zov; and forsook כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is no הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become דֶּֽשֶׁא׃ <S%H1877><s%> De-she. [it] because there was no grass

וּפְרָאִים֙ <S%H6501><s%> u-fe-ra-'Im And the wild asses עָמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> 'a-me-Du did stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on שְׁפָיִ֔ם <S%H8205><s%> she-fa-Yim, in the high places שָׁאֲפ֥וּ <S%H7602><s%> sha-'a-Fu they snuffed up ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach the wind כַּתַּנִּ֑ים <S%H8577><s%> kat-tan-Nim; like dragons כָּל֥וּ <S%H3615><s%> ka-Lu did fail עֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Hem their eyes כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there עֵֽשֶׂב׃ <S%H6212><s%> 'E-sev. because [there was] no grass

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Although עֲוֹנֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Nei-nu though our iniquities עָ֣נוּ <S%H6030><s%> 'A-nu testify בָ֔נוּ Va-nu, יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD עֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Seh against us do לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an sake שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha; thou [it] for thy name's כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Truly רַבּ֥וּ <S%H7231><s%> rab-Bu are many מְשׁוּבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H4878><s%> me-shu-vo-Tei-nu sake for our backslidings לְךָ֥ le-Cha חָטָֽאנוּ׃ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-nu. we have sinned

מִקְוֵה֙ <S%H4723><s%> mik-Veh O the hope יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מֽוֹשִׁיע֖וֹ <S%H3467><s%> mo-shi-'O the saviour בְּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> be-'Et thereof in time צָרָ֑ה <S%H6869><s%> tza-Rah; of trouble לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why תִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh like כְּגֵ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> ke-Ger why shouldest thou be as a stranger בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, in the land וּכְאֹרֵ֖חַ <S%H732><s%> u-che-'o-Re-ach and as a wayfaring man נָטָ֥ה <S%H5186><s%> na-Tah [that] turneth aside לָלֽוּן׃ <S%H3885><s%> la-Lun. to tarry for a night

לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why תִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh like כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ke-'Ish Why shouldest thou be as a man נִדְהָ֔ם <S%H1724><s%> nid-Ham, astonied כְּגִבּ֖וֹר <S%H1368><s%> ke-gib-Bor as a mighty man לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> yu-Chal [that] cannot לְהוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <S%H3467><s%> le-ho-Shi-a'; save וְאַתָּ֧ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah in בְקִרְבֵּ֣נוּ <S%H7130><s%> ve-kir-Be-nu [art] in the midst יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh ;yet thou O LORD וְשִׁמְךָ֛ <S%H8034><s%> ve-shim-Cha by thy name עָלֵ֥ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu and we נִקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> nik-Ra of us and we are called אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תַּנִּחֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3240><s%> tan-ni-Che-nu. leave ס sa-Mek

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am unto this people הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, to this כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so אָֽהֲבוּ֙ <S%H157><s%> 'a-ha-Vu Thus have they loved לָנ֔וּעַ <S%H5128><s%> la-Nu-a', to wander רַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> rag-lei-Hem their feet לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not חָשָׂ֑כוּ <S%H2820><s%> cha-Sa-chu; they have not refrained וַיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh therefore the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not רָצָ֔ם <S%H7521><s%> ra-Tzam, doth not accept עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah now יִזְכֹּ֣ר <S%H2142><s%> yiz-Kor them he will now remember עֲוֹנָ֔ם <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Nam, their iniquity וְיִפְקֹ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> ve-yif-Kod and visit חַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> chat-to-Tam. their sins ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּתְפַּלֵּ֛ל <S%H6419><s%> tit-pal-Lel unto me Pray בְּעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> be-'ad- about הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am not for this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh of this לְטוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H2896><s%> le-to-Vah. for [their] good

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki When יָצֻ֗מוּ <S%H6684><s%> ya-Tzu-mu, When they fast אֵינֶ֤נִּי <S%H369><s%> 'ei-Nen-ni I am not שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> sho-Me-a' I will not hear אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to רִנָּתָ֔ם <S%H7440><s%> rin-na-Tam, their cry וְכִ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi and when יַעֲל֛וּ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu and when they offer עֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah burnt offering וּמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> u-min-Chah and an oblation אֵינֶ֣נִּי <S%H369><s%> 'ei-Nen-ni I am not רֹצָ֑ם <S%H7521><s%> ro-Tzam; I will not accept כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, Rather בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev them by the sword וּבָרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> u-va-ra-'Av and by the famine וּבַדֶּ֔בֶר <S%H1698><s%> u-vad-De-ver, and by the pestilence אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְכַלֶּ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> me-chal-Leh them but I will consume אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam. ס sa-Mek

וָאֹמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar Then said אֲהָ֣הּ׀ <S%H162><s%> 'a-Hah I Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Look הַנְּבִאִ֜ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im behold the prophets אֹמְרִ֤ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim say לָהֶם֙ la-Hem לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> tir-'U unto them Ye shall not see חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev, the sword וְרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ve-ra-'Av neither shall ye have famine לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh have לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for שְׁל֤וֹם <S%H7965><s%> she-Lom peace אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met you assured אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten but I will give לָכֶ֔ם <S%H99999><s%> la-Chem, בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Then the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about שֶׁ֚קֶר <S%H8267><s%> ker lies הַנְּבִאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im unto me The prophets נִבְּאִ֣ים <S%H5012><s%> nib-be-'Im prophesy בִּשְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> bish-Mi, in my name לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo have neither שְׁלַחְתִּים֙ <S%H7971><s%> she-lach-Tim I sent וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor צִוִּיתִ֔ים <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Tim, them not neither have I commanded וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor דִבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti them neither spake אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem; about חֲז֨וֹן <S%H2377><s%> cha-Zon vision שֶׁ֜קֶר <S%H8267><s%> She-ker unto you a false וְקֶ֤סֶם <S%H7081><s%> ve-Ke-sem and divination; וֶאֱלוּל ve-'e-lul כוֶֽאֱלִיל֙ <S%H457><s%> ve-'e-Lil idol ק; וְתַרְמוּת ve-tar-mut כוְתַרְמִ֣ית <S%H8649><s%> ve-tar-Mit deceit קלִבָּ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bam, of their heart הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they מִֽתְנַבְּאִ֥ים <S%H5012><s%> mit-nab-be-'Im unto them they prophesy לָכֶֽם׃ <S%H99999><s%> la-Chem. ס sa-Mek
